## 七 破解激活

### Windwos

- [KMSpico](http://www.onlinedown.net/soft/580785.htm)

### CCleaner

先下载CCleaner Pro 5.22.5724官方中文版，默认安装，断网，用下面激活码激活。
注册名任意，激活后要在设置中取消联网自动更新检查。
[http://download.piriform.com/ccsetup522pro.exe](http://download.piriform.com/ccsetup522pro.exe)
注册码：断网注册，输入注册码
C2YW-VXVH-Z7RD-RMJZ-8ZPC

C2YW-WNVI-AYRY-M24E-8ZPC

### JetBrains

#### license server

[http://www.iteblog.com/idea/key.php](http://www.iteblog.com/idea/key.php)

[http://idea.iteblog.com/key.PHP](http://idea.iteblog.com/key.PHP)

[http://xidea.online](http://xidea.online)

#### 获取注册码

[http://idea.lanyus.com/](http://idea.lanyus.com/)

#### 激活码

```key
ASAJIXAQ0D---
```
